column4: I was just looking at that issue Drumline, and Reiserfs seems to be pretty mature, it's just that it's optimized for extremely small files (with an efficiency gain of about 10-15 times according to wikipedia)...  So unless you really need it, don't worry about it.
it's a LOT faster if you are dealing with tons of small files
I run qmail queues on Reiser and they totally haul ass
I'll bet, it seems to be optimized for files under 4K.
